title: Ambulance lettering ID
content:
Here's another one...anyone know this face?

As always, thanks to all.

DA

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011125534im_/http:/typophile.com/files/letters_6043.jpg)
author: dla_001

comments.content:
Im not certain,but I think it might just be signage by a signmaker rather than an actual typeface?

m o s t i q u e . c o m  
DESIGN IS LIFE. AND I LIVE

@ gwatswon - it's computer-cut, so it's unlikely to be unique by a signmaker...  
@ Spire - I agree that it's similar, but the serifs on the E and L aren't like in Copperplate Gothic...

Any other suggestions?

Continuing thanks...

DA

I'm still hoping for some more suggestions for the ambulance lettering face...anyone?

Thanks in advance...

David
